definition: to see/to meet/to appear (to be sth)/to interview
acrobatic display (esp. on horseback) (old)/variant of 懈[xie4] and 邂[xie4] (old)
to divide/to break up/to split/to separate/to dissolve/to solve/to melt/to remove/to untie/to loosen/to open/to emancipate/to explain/to understand/to know/a solution/a dissection

sentences.english: Improvements will be made, and you will have a more positive outlook on life in general.
sentences.chinese: 本會有釐正，將對生在總體上有更主動的見解。

sentences.english: And the writer's view is presented about the development of blowing agent.
sentences.chinese: 最後對發泡劑的發展提出了自己的見解。

sentences.english: I strongly disagree with his views.
What aresuperstitions? They are patches for the holes and defects of our knowledge and view.
sentences.chinese: 甚麼是迷信？我們知識與見解中的漏洞與不足的補丁。

sentences.english: Unique Packaging, a highly visual sourcebook, shows the contemporary work of important international package designers.
sentences.chinese: 每一件作品都有設計師的獨到見解和設計思路。
不同的人，對事物有不同的見解。

sentences.english: redefine my girlish notions of romance.
sentences.chinese: 讓我爲自己對愛情的見解下個定義。

sentences.english: Furthermore, this article discusses and analyses several different opinions about sports science.
sentences.chinese: 文章還討論和分析了幾種對體育學的不同見解。

sentences.english: I asked Wu what he makes of it.
sentences.chinese: 我問吳教授他有何見解。

sentences.english: Where do you get all of your insight from?
sentences.chinese: 你從哪兒得到所有這些見解的？

sentences.english: Ideas on search for minerals and exploitation of precious stone resources in Sichuan are put forward.
sentences.chinese: 就四川寶玉石普查找礦和開發利用提出了見解。

sentences.english: The article also presents the new point about…
sentences.chinese: 並對貴州龍的復原圖提出了新的見解。
荊浩對“巧”有着深刻的見解。

sentences.english: It also gives opinions on the questions of induced oxidation.
sentences.chinese: 文中並對誘導氧化等問題提出了見解。

sentences.english: His views on landscapes developed from travelling and reading.
sentences.chinese: 他對園林的見解是源自旅行和讀書。

sentences.english: Do you have any comments or thoughts on this project?
sentences.chinese: 您對這個項目有什麼見解或想法嗎？

definition: to enlighten/to explain (a text etc)/to stimulate (a mental attitude)/enlightenment/revelation/motivation
conclusion/verdict/CL:個|个[ge4]/to conclude/to reach a verdict
theory/CL:個|个[ge4]/to argue/to take notice of
